We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private DoubleExponentialMovingAverage _dema;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_dema = DEMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_dema.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "DEMA Current", _dema.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.dema = self.DEMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.dema.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DEMA Current", self.dema.Current);
